content:
Travel Diary 1

I used to live on Gem Street, where I'd be woken up at the same time every day. I'd climb onto the roof to watch tourists flood into the Planette, then expose dishonest gem merchants, get into arguments with them, and finally smash nearby minerals with one strike to "win the argument with reason."

At night, perched on the roof, my glowing reflective eyes made people mistake me for the legendary "luminous lantern" from the Gem Night Market tales.

I got chased by a blacksmith for drooling while staring at their mineral forging process, and in my panic, I scrambled onto the roof of a departing travel vehicle...

Finding myself in an unfamiliar place, I was bewildered but quickly regained composure, sat down, and started thinking.
The conclusion of my thoughts was that I absolutely needed to have stewed meat for lunch today.
And just like that, I somehow began my journey in search of rare minerals and stewed meat...
